name: Eng. Mokbul hasan
comment: Dr. Prodip is an amazing doctor and an awesome person. There is no comparison to him anywhere. State of the art and skilled. Wonderful office and support staff

name: Fahim
comment: Dr Utpalkanti the best! I moved to the east side of town over 6 years ago and I still have him as our family dentist . he is great , brilliant, great attitude , worth every penny , from tom .

name: Rasel
comment: I would like to thank Shima Khatun for my wisdom teeth extraction. Great job! Great attitude! Answered ALL my questions! IV was great! Follow was good. Would definitely recommend
